text:
Hello all — Happy New Year. Is there a way to use Smart Content on a module to pull an RSS feed from an external job board? The use case is someone with a job board (hosted by Salesforce) looking to embed this on a HubSpot landing page, and pull job positions based on the US State they are based in. I know the part once it gets into HubSpot, just unsure about how structure the module correctly.

Let me know your thoughts and thanks in advance.

Hello everyone!
Do any of you know how to use the options "bold - italic - underline" with the field type "font_field"?
Thanks !
```{
            "name": "font_field",
            "label": "font_field",
            "required": false,
            "locked": false,
            "inline_help_text": "",
            "help_text": "",
            "load_external_fonts": true,
            "type": "font",
            "default": {
              "size": 20,
              "font":"Montserrat",
              "font_set":"GOOGLE",
              "size_unit": "px",
              "color": "#666666",
              "styles": { 

              }```
            }
